main event: On November 6, 1957, a resident of Montville, Ohio reported seeing a bright orange-red light in the sky that moved rapidly and made several abrupt turns before disappearing.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be the size of a basketball, The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes, Mr. Woford observed the light moving in a westerly direction at an estimated altitude of 3000-4000 feet, No other witnesses have been identified, The report concluded that insufficient information was available to determine the nature of the sighting.
sighted object: bright orange-red light in the sky
witness description: Mr. Joseph Woford, a reliable individual
